content: maybe you have already made the ankylosaurus tom anks - free pattern from my instagram account handmade_by_halime now it is time for junior to shine make tom anks jr the pattern is written in english and using us crochet terms the pattern is straight forward and easy to follow you need to know the basic crochet skill for amigurumi especially how to work in rounds or spiral some examples of stitches single_crochet bobble stitch increases and decreases materials required yarn i used a cotton and acrylic blend dk weight yarn scheepjes soft fun for the main color it is enough with 25 g colors used moss green 2606 wheat beige 2533 pecan brown 2491 lace white 2426 mini version was made with fingering weight yarn mixed yarn & colors favorite hobbii rainbow 8/4 etc crochet hook 2 5 mm mini version 1 75 mm fibrefill / toy stuffing stitch marker scissor and embroidery needle security eyes 8 mm mini version 6 mm size 16 cm/6 in length mini version 12 cm/ 5 in in length the pattern is a pdf and you will need adobe reader to open it adobe reader is free to download from the internet please note these patterns are for personal use only you may make as many items as you wish for yourself or as gifts you may sell any items you produce from this pattern in small quantities but please link back or give credit to me as the designer please do not share reproduce or sell this pattern or any pictures please respect my rights as a designer please follow my instagram account @handmade_by_halime thank you
